1864084.effect: You can Special Summon this card (from your hand) by Tributing 1 Plant monster. If this card is sent from the field to the GY: You can Special Summon 1 "Rose Dragon" monster from your hand or GY. You can only use this effect of "Magink Angel of Roses" once per turn. When you Ritual Summon a "Rose Dragon" monster, you can banish this card from your GY as 1 of the monsters required for the Ritual Summon.
1864084.name: Magink Angel of Roses

1864827.effect: If this card is Normal or Special Summoned: You can add 1 "Magink Rose Rising", or 1 Spell/Trap that specifically lists the card "Black Rose Dragon" in its text, from your Deck to your hand. If this card is sent from the field to the GY: You can target 1 "Rose Dragon" or 1 Level 4 or higher Plant monster in your GY, except "Magink Red Rose Dragon"; add it to your hand. You can only use each effect of "Magink Red Rose Dragon" once per turn.
1864827.name: Magink Red Rose Dragon

1864875.effect: You can only use 1 of the following effects of "Magink Rose Maiden" per turn, and only once that turn.● If this card is Tributed for a Ritual Summon: You can target 1 Dragon or Plant monster in your GY; shuffle it into the Deck, then draw 1 card.● If this card is sent to the GY as Synchro Material: You can banish 1 card from either GY.● If this card is destroyed by card effect: You can destroy 1 monster your opponent controls.
1864875.name: Magink Rose Maiden

1864054.effect: When this card destroys an opponent's monster by battle: You can add 1 "Magink" monster from your Deck to your hand, except "Magink Rose Paladin". If you control a "Rose Dragon" monster: You can banish this card from your GY; until the end of this turn, negate the effects of all face-up monsters your opponent currently controls, except Plant monsters. You can only use this effect of "Magink Rose Paladin" once per turn.
1864054.name: Magink Rose Paladin

1864818.effect: You can discard this card and 1 "Rose Dragon" monster or Plant monster; add 1 "Rose Dragon" monster from your Deck to your hand, except "Magink White Rose Dragon". If a monster(s) you control is destroyed by card effect, while this card is in your GY (except during the Damage Step): You can Special Summon this card, but banish it when it leaves the field. You can only use each effect of "Magink White Rose Dragon" once per turn.
1864818.name: Magink White Rose Dragon

1864832.effect: You can Ritual Summon this card with "Magink Rose Rising". During your Main Phase: You can banish any number of Dragon and/or Plant monsters from your GY, then destroy an equal number of cards your opponent controls. You can only use this effect of "Magink Rose Dragon" once per turn. If this card is destroyed by battle, or if this card in its owner's possession is sent to your GY by an opponent's card: You can Special Summon 1 Level 7 or lower Dragon or Plant Synchro Monster from your Extra Deck. (This is treated as a Synchro Summon.)
1864832.name: Magink Black Rose Dragon

1864837.effect:
The first time this face-up card on the field would be destroyed by a card effect, it is not destroyed. All Plant monsters you control gain 500 ATK/DEF. You can only use each of the following effects of "Magink Corruption" once per turn.
●You can discard 1 card, then target 1 monster you control; destroy it.
●If a face-up monster(s) you control is destroyed by battle or card effect: You can add 1 "Magink" card with a different name from your Deck to your hand, except "Magink Corruption".
1864837.name: Magink Corruption

1864829.effect: This card is used to Ritual Summon "Magink Black Rose Dragon". You must also Tribute monsters from your hand or field whose total Levels equal or exceed the Level of the Ritual Monster you Ritual Summon. During your Main Phase, except the turn this card was sent to the GY: You can banish this card, 1 Dragon monster, and 1 Plant monster from your GY, including a Tuner; Special Summon 1 "Rose" Synchro Monster or 1 Plant Synchro Monster from your Extra Deck, ignoring its Summoning conditions. You can only use this effect of "Magink Rose Rising" once per turn.
1864829.name: Magink Rose Rising

1869131.effect:
(This card is always treated as a "New Order" card.) You can only activate 1 "Entrance to Astral World" per turn. Target 1 "New Order" monster in your GY: Special Summon it, then, if possible, attach this card to that monster as material. A "New Order" monster that has this card as material gains the following effect:
● Once per turn, you can detach 1 material from this card: Special Summon from your Extra Deck or GY, 1 "New Order" Xyz Monster that is 2 Ranks lower than this card, then attach this card to it as material (This Special Summon is treated as an Xyz Summon. Xyz Materials attached to it also become Xyz Materials on the Summoned monster.)
1869131.name: Entrance to Astral World

1610412.effect: (This is treated as a "New Order" card) Banish 1 Xyz Monster from your Graveyard that was destroyed this turn; Special Summon from your Extra Deck, 1 Xyz Monster that is 2 Ranks higher than the banished Xyz Monster, ignoring the Summoning conditions (This is treated as an Xyz Summon). You can only use 1 "Ascension Spiral" per turn.
1610412.name: Ascension Spiral

1869026.effect:
2 Level 4 monsters, including a "New Order" monster
You can detach 1 material from this card, then target 1 non-Xyz "New Order" monster in your GY: Special Summon it, but for the rest of the turn, you cannot summon monsters from the Extra Deck, except "New Order" Monsters. If a "New Order" Xyz Monster is Special Summoned from your Extra Deck by the effect of a "Rank-Up-Magic" card; You can Special Summon this card from your GY, then attach a card from your GY to this card as material. You can only use 1 effect of "New Order 4: Etheric Chimera" per turn, and only once per turn.
1869026.name: New Order 4: Etheric Chimera

1869051.effect:
4 Level 8 monsters
You can detach 1 material from this card, then target 1 other face-up monster you control: It can make a second attack during the Battle Phase this turn, and any monster it battles loses 500 ATK. If this card is in your GY, you can banish this card and 10 other "New Order" cards from your GY; Special Summon, from your Extra Deck, 1 "New Order 13: Etheric Amon", and if you do, attach the top 3 cards from both players Decks onto it as material (This is treated as an Xyz Summon.) You can only use each effect of "New Order 8: Etheric Dragon" once per turn.
1869051.name: New Order 8: Etheric Dragon

1870366.effect: When this card is Normal Summoned: You can Special Summon 1 "Charismatic" monster from your hand. If this card is sent to the GY as Link Material for the Summon of a "Charismatic" Link Monster, you can pay 1000 LP; Special Summon this card from your GY. You cannot Summon monsters for the rest of this turn, except "Charismatic" monsters, the turn you activate either of these effects. You can only use each effect of "Charismatic Healer" once per turn.
1870366.name: Charismatic Healer

1870387.effect: When this card is Normal or Special Summoned: You can send 1 "Charism" card from your Deck to the GY. If this card is sent to the GY as Link Material for the Summon of a "Charismatic" Link Monster, you can shuffle 1 card from your hand into the Deck; Special Summon 1 "Charismatic)" monster from your GY, except "Charismatic Necromancer". You cannot Summon monsters for the rest of this turn, except "Charismatic" monsters, the turn you activate either of these effects. You can only use each effect of "Charismatic Necromancer" once per turn.
1870387.name: Charismatic Necromancer

1870348.effect: When this card is Normal or Special Summoned: You can Special Summon 1 "Charism Token" (Spellcaster/LIGHT/ATK 0/DEF 0) to your side of the field. If this card is sent to the GY as Link Material for the Summon of a "Charismatic" Link Monster, you can discard 1 card; add 1 "Charism" Spell from your Deck to your hand. You can only You cannot Summon monsters the turn you activate either of these effects, except "Charismatic" monsters. only use each effect of "Charismatic Servant" once per turn.
1870348.name: Charismatic Servant

1870509.effect: Equip only to a "Charismatic" monster. It gains 500 ATK, and it cannot be targeted by card effects. (Quick Effect) You can Tribute the monster this card is equipped to: Take control of 1 monster your opponent controls. It cannot attack and its effects are negated. If this card leaves the field while equipped to a monster, your opponent draws 1 card, then discards 1 card. You can only control 1 "Enigma - Sword of True Charism", and you can only activate 1 "Enigma - Sword of True Charism" per turn.
1870509.name: Enigma - Sword of True Charism

1870488.effect: Tribute 1 monster you control or 1 monster you control that is owned by your opponent; Special Summon 1 "Charismatic)" monster from your Deck. If you Tributed a monster you controlled that was owned by your opponent, you can Special Summon 2 monsters, instead, but if you do, those monsters effects are negated. You can banish this card from your GY and discard 1 card; reveal 2 random cards in your opponents hand, and if there is a Monster among those cards, Special Summon it time your side of the field. You cannot Summon monsters the turn you activate this card, except "Charismatic" monsters. You can only activate 1 "Forbidden Charism" per turn, and only once that turn.
1870488.name: Forbidden Charism

1870506.effect: You can target 1 monster on the field: Gain LP equal to that monsters ATK. If you control a monster that is owned by your opponent at this cards activation, you can draw 1 card. You can banish this card from your GY; shuffle 5 "Charism" cards that are banished or in the GY into the Deck; draw 1 card. You cannot Summon monsters the turn you activate this card, except "Charismatic" monsters. You can only activate 1 "Healing Charism" per turn.
1870506.name: Healing Charism

1870496.effect: If you control a monster that is owned by your opponent, you can pay 1000 LP; destroy 1 card on the field. You must control 2 or more "Charismatic" monsters to resolve this effect. You can only use this effect of "Judgment Charism" once per turn. "Charismatic" monsters cannot be destroyed by card effects, and if they would be destroyed the first time by battle, they are not. You cannot Summon monsters while you control this card, except "Charismatic" monsters. You can only activate 1 "Judgement Charism" per turn.
1870496.name: Judgement Charism

1870512.effect: All "Charismatic" monsters gain 500 ATK. You can discard 1 card: Add 1 "Charism" card from your Deck to your hand. You can Tribute 1 (Charismatic) Link Monster, then target an equal number of cards on the field equal to its Link Rating; return them to the hand. (Quick Effect) If you control a "Charismatic" monster, immediately after this resolves, Link Summon 1 "Charismatic" Link Monster, using monsters you control as Link Material, including at least 1 monster you control that is owned by your opponent If this card is sent to the GY, you can pay 1000 LP; reveal your opponents hand, but if you do, you must reveal your hand as well. You can only use each effect of "Ruins of Charism" once per turn. You can only activate 1 "Ruins of Charism" per turn.
1870512.name: Ruins of Charism

1870425.effect:
1 Level 4 or lower "Charismatic" monster
When this card is Link Summoned: Target 1 monster in your opponents GY; Special Summon it to your side of the field. Immediately after this resolves, Link Summon 1 "Charismatic" Link Monster, using monsters you control as material. You can discard 1 card; gain 2000 LP. You must control a monster that is owned by your opponent to resolve this effect. You can only use each effect of "Charismatic Astrologist" once per turn.
1870425.name: Charismatic Astrologist

1870469.effect:
2+ monsters, including a monster you control that is owned by your opponent and a "Charismatic" monster
When this card is Link Summoned: Target 1 Spell/Trap on the field; Shuffle it into the Deck. If you control "Charismatic Paladin" (Quick Effect), you can Tribute any number of monsters you control that are owned by your opponent: Draw 1 card for each monster Tributed with a different name. If 10 or more monsters are Tributed by this effect, and you have less than 4000 LP, you win the Duel. You can discard 1 card; your opponent discards 1 card. You must control a monster that is owned by your opponent to resolve this effect. You can only use each effect of "Charismatic Empress" once per turn.
1870469.name: Charismatic Empress

1870461.effect:
2+ monsters, including a monster you control that is owned by your opponent and a "Charismatic" monster
When this card is Link Summoned: Target 1 monster on the field; Send it to the GY. If you control "Charismatic Empress" (Quick Effect), you can discard any number of cards: Take control of an equal number of monsters your opponent controls. Their effects are negated, and they cannot attack, also return them during the End Phase. You can discard 1 card; both players reveal their hands, also discard all Traps among the revealed cards. You must control a monster that is owned by your opponent to resolve this effect. You can only use each effect of "Charismatic Paladin" once per turn.
1870461.name: Charismatic Paladin

1869524.effect: If a "Charismatic" card(s) is sent to your GY: You can Special Summon this card from your hand. If this card is Normal or Special Summoned: You can target 1 card on the field; destroy it, then banish 1 card from your GY, face-down. You can only use each effect of "Jaren, Charismatic Interpreter" once per turn.
1869524.name: Jaren, Charismatic Interpreter

1869377.effect: When your opponent activates a monster effect on the field while you control a "Charismatic" monster (Quick Effect): You can send this card from your hand or field to the GY; immediately after this effect resolves, Link Summon 1 LIGHT Spellcaster Link Monster, by using only that opponent's monster and monsters you control as material, then banish 1 card from your GY, face-down. You can only use this effect of "Johnson, Charismatic Adjudicator" once per turn.
1869377.name: Johnson, Charismatic Adjudicator

1869509.effect: If this card is Normal Summoned: You can send 1 "Charismatic" card from your Deck to your GY. If this card is sent to the GY as Link Material: You can target 1 "Charismatic" card in your GY, except "Charismatic Philosopher"; add it to your hand. You can only use each effect of "Jones, Charismatic Philosopher" once per turn.
1869509.name: Jones, Charismatic Philosopher

1869356.effect: During your opponent's turn (Quick Effect): You can Special Summon 1 "Charismatic Energy Token" (Fairy/LIGHT/Level 5/ATK 1000/DEF 1000), then gain 1000 LP. If this card is in your GY: You can return 1 Link-2 Spellcaster Link Monster from your field or GY to your Extra Deck; Special Summon this card. You can only use each effect of "Jordan, Charismatic Healer" once per turn.
1869356.name: Jordan, Charismatic Healer

1870561.effect: If your opponent controls more monsters than you do: Special Summon 1 "Charismatic" Link Monster from your Extra Deck, then banish cards from your GY, face-down, equal to its Link Rating on the field, but it cannot activate its effects until the end of your next turn, also you cannot Special Summon monsters from your Extra Deck for the rest of this turn. (This is treated as a Link Summon.) If a "Charismatic" Link Monster in your Extra Monster Zone would be destroyed by battle or card effect, you can banish this card from your GY, instead. You can only use 1 "Charismatic Holy Recompense" effect per turn, and only once that turn.
1870561.name: Charismatic Holy Recompense

1869477.effect: "Charismatic" monsters you control gain 500 ATK/DEF. You can discard 1 card; add 1 "Charismatic" card from your Deck to your hand with the same card type (Monster, Spell, or Trap) but a different name. You can only use this effect of "Charismatic Scales of Justice" once per turn. You can only control 1 "Charismatic Scales of Justice".
1869477.name: Charismatic Scales of Justice

1869495.effect: When your opponent activates a monster effect while you control a Link-2 Spellcaster Link Monster: Negate the activation, and if you do, if you control a LIGHT monster, Tribute that opponent's monster. You can only activate 1 "Charismatic Divine Intervention" per turn.
1869495.name: Charismatic Divine Intervention

1869470.effect: If you control no non-LIGHT monsters: Special Summon 1 "Charismatic" monster from your Deck, also it cannot be destroyed by battle or card effects for the rest of this turn. You can only activate 1 "The Charismatic Divine Book" per turn.
1869470.name: The Charismatic Divine Book

1686388.effect:
2 non-Link Monsters with different Types
Cannot be used as Link Material the turn it is Link Summoned. Linked monsters on the field cannot be Tributed, also they gain 300 ATK. Any card Tributed and sent to the GY is banished instead. Once per turn, during the End Phase: Tribute 1 monster you control.
1686388.name: Charismatic Acolyte

1313930.effect:
2 monsters, including a monster owned by your opponent
You cannot Special Summon monsters from the Extra Deck. (Quick Effect): You can target 1 monster your opponent controls; take control of it, also banish it face-down if this card leaves the field. You can only use this effect of "Charismatic Priest" once per turn. If this card would be destroyed by an opponent's card, you can destroy 1 monster you control that your opponent owns, instead. If you control 5 monsters owned by your opponent, you win the Duel.
1313930.name: Charismatic Priest

1558753.effect:
2 Effect Monsters, including a "Charismatic" monster
During your opponent's Main Phase, if you control this card in the Extra Monster Zone (Quick Effect): You can look at up to 2 random cards in your opponent's hand, then, you can Special Summon 1 monster from among the revealed cards and your opponent's GY, but its effects are negated. During your opponent's Main or Battle Phase, you can (Quick Effect): Immediately after this effect resolves, Link Summon 1 Link-2 Spellcaster Link Monster using materials you control, including this card. You can only use each effect of "Charismatic Priestess" once per turn.
1558753.name: Charismatic Priestess

1565558.effect: If you control a Link-2 Spellcaster Link Monster: Target 1 Set card your opponent controls; send it to the GY, then you can Set it to your field. You can only activate 1 "Charismatic Divine Conversion" per turn.
1565558.name: Charismatic Divine Conversion

1868436.effect:
2 LIGHT Spellcaster monsters, including a "Charismatic" monster
(Quick Effect): You can target 1 LIGHT Spellcaster monster in your GY; Special Summon it, but you cannot Special Summon monsters for the rest of this turn, except Link-2 Spellcaster Link Monsters. You can only use this effect of "Charismatic Minister" once per turn.
1868436.name: Charismatic Minister

1623170.effect: If this card is Special Summoned: You can banish 1 Spell/Trap from your GY that lists "Darkwater" in its text. If this card is banished: You can add 1 of your banished "Darkwater" Spells/Traps to your hand. You can only use 1 monster effect of "Darkwater Angler" per turn and only once that turn.
1623170.name: Darkwater Angler
1623170.pendulum_effect: Once per turn, if your "Darkwater" monster inflicts battle damage to your opponent: You can target 1 card in either GY; banish it.

1623184.effect: If this card is Special Summoned: You can banish 1 "Darkwater" monster from your Deck except "Darkwater Fishook". If this card is banished: You can add 1 of your banished "Darkwater" monsters to your hand, except "Darkwater Fishook". You can only use 1 monster effect of "Darkwater Fishook" per turn and only once that turn.
1623184.name: Darkwater Fishook
1623184.pendulum_effect: Once per turn, if your "Darkwater" monster inflicts battle damage to your opponent: You can target 1 other card on the field; banish it.

1623160.effect: If this card is Special Summoned: You can banish 1 face-up "Darkwater" monster from your Extra Deck, except "Darkwater Penrod". If this card is banished: You can add 1 "Darkwater" Spell/Trap from your Deck to your hand. You can only use 1 monster effect of "Darkwater Penrod" per turn and only once that turn.
1623160.name: Darkwater Penrod
1623160.pendulum_effect: Once per turn, if your "Darkwater" monster inflicts battle damage to your opponent: You can banish 1 face-up card from either player's Extra Deck.

1623151.effect: If this card is Special Summoned: You can banish 1 card from your hand that lists "Darkwater" in its text, and if you do, draw 1 card. If this card is banished: You can add 1 "Darkwater" monster from your Deck to your hand, except "Darkwater Wheelback". You can only use 1 monster effect of "Darkwater Wheelback" per turn and only once that turn.
1623151.name: Darkwater Wheelback
1623151.pendulum_effect: Once per turn, if your "Darkwater" monster inflicts battle damage to your opponent: You can banish 1 random card from either player's hand.

1623302.effect: One of the many horrifying creatures dwelling in the watery abyss. It drags its victims down to the darkest depths when it attacks.
1623302.name: Darkwater Cuttershark
1623302.pendulum_effect: When this card is activated: You can place 1 "Darkwater" Pendulum Monster from your Deck in your other Pendulum Zone, except "Darkwater Cuttershark". You cannot Special Summon monsters the turn you activate this effect, except "Darkwater" monsters. This effect cannot be negated.

1623316.effect: Having spent ages navigating the darkest depths, this creature has perfect vision in the dark, which it uses to ambush its enemies.
1623316.name: Darkwater Maliceel
1623316.pendulum_effect: When this card is activated: You can place 1 "Darkwater" Pendulum Monster from your Deck in your other Pendulum Zone, except "Darkwater Maliceel". You cannot Special Summon monsters the turn you activate this effect, except "Darkwater" monsters. This effect cannot be negated.

1611198.effect: Add 1 "Darkwater" card from your Deck to your hand. If this card is banished: You can add 1 of your banished "Darkwater" cards to your hand. You can only use each effect of "Dismal Backwater" once per turn.
1611198.name: Dismal Backwater

1623225.effect: (This card is always treated as a "Darkwater" card)Special Summon 1 "Darkwater" monster from your hand or that is banished. If this card is banished: You can add 1 of your banished "Darkwater" cards to your hand, except "Omen of the Depths". You can only use each effect of "Omen of the Depths" once per turn.
1623225.name: Omen of the Depths

1610982.effect: (This card is always treated as a "Darkwater" card.) Special Summon 1 "Darkwater" monster from your Deck or face-up Extra Deck, but banish it during the End Phase of this turn. If this card is banished: You can target 1 card your opponent controls; destroy it. You can only use each effect of "Drowned Secrets of the Abyss" once per turn.
1610982.name: Drowned Secrets of the Abyss

1623221.effect: (This card is always treated as a "Darkwater" card.)When a Spell/Trap Card, or monster effect, is activated while you control a "Darkwater" monster: Negate the activation, and if you do, destroy it. If this card is banished: You can target 1 card your opponent controls; destroy it. You can only use each effect of "Watery Grave" once per turn.
1623221.name: Watery Grave

1869502.effect: Target 1 card in your Pendulum Zone: Make that card's Pendulum Scale equal to another card's Pendulum Scale in other Pendulum Zone on either side of the field. You can only activate 1 "Cosmic Primal - The Reflection Realm" per turn.
1869502.name: Cosmic Primal - The Reflection Realm

1865171.effect:
2 Fairy-Type monsters, including 1 "Cosmic Primal" monster
If this card is Link Summoned: You can discard 1 card from your hand or banish 1 card from your GY; add 1 "Cosmic Primal" card from your Deck to your hand, then show your hand to your opponent. During the Main Phase: You can target 1 card this card points to, then, add 1 "Cosmic Primal" card from your Deck or GY to your hand with the same card type (Monster, Spell, or Trap) as the targeted card, and if you do, destroy that targeted card. If the Pendulum Scale of one of your "Cosmic Primal" card in your Pendulum Zones changes: You can increase or decrease the Pendulum Scale of other card in your Pendulum Zones by the same amount. You can only use each effect of "Cosmic Primal - The Moral" once per turn.
1865171.name: Cosmic Primal - The Moral

1865214.effect: 3 "Cosmic Primal" monstersMust be either Fusion Summoned, or Special Summoned from your Extra Deck by Tributing the above cards you control. (This is treated as a Fusion Summon). If this card is Fusion Summoned: You can Special Summon any number of "Cosmic Primal" cards from your Pendulum Zones. During the Main Phase: You can declare 1 card name; You opponent discards any number of cards from their hand with the same name as the declared card (Cards discarded by this effect cannot activate their effects until the end of this turn). You can only use each effect of "Cosmic Primal - Mind" once per turn.
1865214.name: Cosmic Primal - Mind

1867865.effect: You can Normal Summon this card without Tributing, but if you do, its Level becomes 3 and its original ATK/DEF are halved. Banish this card when it leaves the field. At the start of the Damage Step, when this card battles an opponent's monster: You can banish both until the End Phase. If this card is currently banished: You can target 1 monster you control and 1 monster your opponent controls; banish them, then add this banished card to your hand. You can only use this effect of "D.D. Guardbreaker" once per turn.
1867865.name: D.D. Guardbreaker

1879148.effect: If this card is Normal Summoned: You can send 1 Level 4 monster from your Deck to your GY. If a Level 4 monster with 1600 ATK or DEF is Special Summoned from your Deck: You can Special Summon this card from your GY (but banish it when it leaves the field), and if you do, banish 1 card from your opponent's GY. You can only use this effect of "Shi Hand" once per turn.
1879148.name: Shi Hand

1710768.effect: If this card is Normal or Special Summoned: You can Special Summon 1 Beast monster from your hand in face-up or face-down Defense Position. You can only use this effect of "Tropaejus, Mystical Beast of the Forest" once per turn.
1710768.name: Tropaejus, Mystical Beast of the Forest
1710768.treated_as: Tropaejus, Mystical Beast of the Forest

1867878.effect: Target 1 Normal Monster in either GY; Special Summon it in Defense Position, but it cannot be used as material for a Fusion, Synchro, Xyz, or Link Summon, unless all other materials are non-Effect Monsters. You can only activate 1 "Drop of Restoration" per turn.
1867878.name: Drop of Restoration

1847964.effect: During your Main Phase 2: Banish 3 cards from your GY, face-down, including at least 2 cards of different types (Monster, Spell, and Trap); draw 2 cards. You can only activate 1 "Pot of Rapacity" per turn.
1847964.name: Pot of Rapacity

1872289.effect: During your opponent's turn: Neither player can activate cards or effects on their next turn. During the Main Phase: You can banish this card from your GY; gain LP equal to the turn count x 500. You can only use this effect of "Curse of Turn" once per turn.
1872289.name: Curse of Turn

1879118.effect: If your opponent controls more monsters than you do: You can pay 2000 LP, then target 1 monster your opponent controls; return it to the hand. If your opponent conrols more Spells/Traps than you do: You can pay 1000 LP, then target 1 Spell/Trap your opponent controls; return it to the hand. You can only use 1 "Fate's Parry" effect per turn, and only once that turn.
1879118.name: Fate's Parry

1710875.effect:
2 Level 2 monsters
You can also Xyz Summon this card by banishing 1 Level 2 Beast monster from your GY, then using 1 Level 2 monster you control as material. You can only Special Summon "Citrama, Mystical Beast of the Forest" once per turn this way. Once per turn, you can negate an activated card effect that targets another Beast monster(s) you control, then detach 1 material from this card.
1710875.name: Citrama, Mystical Beast of the Forest
1710875.treated_as: Citrama, Mystical Beast of the Forest

1852749.effect:
2 Level 2 Beast monsters
Your opponent cannot target Beast monsters you control for attacks or with card effects, except the Beast Xyz Monster you control with the highest ATK (either, if tied). You can detach 1 material from this card, then target 1 Beast Xyz Monster in your GY; Special Summon it, and if you do, you can attach up to 1 card from each GY to it as material. You can only use this effect of "Rookie Ronin Raccoon Igasaki" once per turn.
1852749.name: Rookie Ronin Raccoon Igasaki

1873911.effect:
1 Special Summoned monster in the center Main Monster Zone
After this card is Special Summoned, you cannot Special Summon monsters from the Extra Deck for the rest of this turn. Gains 500 ATK for each non-Effect Monster on the field or in the GYs. You can banish the top 5 cards of your Deck, face-down; Special Summon 1 "Da Eiza Token" (Fiend/DARK/Level 5/ATK 2000/DEF 2000), but it cannot attack directly. You can only use this effect of "Azur Maju Da Eiza" up to thrice per turn.
1873911.name: Azur Maju Da Eiza

1837069.effect: 2 Level 4 "Dark Arts" monstersThis card's name becomes "Dark Arts Maiden" and "Dark Arts Sorcerer" while on the field, in the GY, or banished. If this card its Xyz Summoned: You can target 1 "Dark Arts" card in your GY; add it to your hand. You can only use this effect of "Dark Arts Chained Spirit" once per turn. Once per turn: You can detach 1 material from this card; shuffle into the Deck, 5 "Dark Arts" cards in your GY, and if you do, draw 1 card.
1837069.name: Dark Arts Chained Spirit

1842600.effect: 3 Level 5 "Dark Arts" monstersYou can also Xyz Summon this card by using a Rank 4 "Dark Arts" Xyz Monster you control as the material. (Transfer its materials to this card.) If this card its Xyz Summoned: You can banish 3 "Dark Arts" cards from your GY; You can shuffle all "Dark Arts" cards in your GY into the Deck. Once per turn: You can detach 1 material from this card; Special Summon 1 "Dark Arts" monster from your GY, but it cannot attack directly or set 1 "Dark Arts" Spell/Trap directly from your GY.
1842600.name: Dark Arts Erratic Spirit

1879983.effect: If your opponent activates an effect that would negate the activation of a Spell card: You can negate that effect activation, and if you do, shuffle that card back into the Deck. If you only control Spell cards on your field, and GY (min. 2), you can activate this card from your hand. You can only activate 1 "N.3.G.A.T.3, Arcane" per turn.
1879983.name: N.3.G.A.T.3, Arcane

1879981.effect: If your opponent activates an effect that would negate the Normal or Special Summon of a monster or would negate a monster effect: You can negate that effect activation, and if you do, shuffle that card back into the Deck. If you only control monster cards on your field (min. 2), and GY, you can activate this card from your hand.
1879981.name: N.3.G.A.T.3, Beasts

1879987.effect: If your opponent activates an effect that would negate the activation of a Trap card: You can negate that effect activation, and if you do, shuffle that card back into the Deck. If you only control Trap cards on your field, and GY, you can activate this card from your hand. You can only activate 1 "N.3.G.A.T.3, Depths" per turn.
1879987.name: N.3.G.A.T.3, Depths

1863061.effect: If you control a "Shinadow" monster: You can Special Summon this card, then add 1 "Shinadow" monster from your face-up Extra Deck to your hand. If you have a "Shinadow" monster in your face-up Spell/Trap zone, you can banish this card from your GY; add 1 "Shinadow" Ritual Spell from your Deck to your hand. You can only use each effect of "Shinadow Pagoda" once per turn.
1863061.name: Shinadow Pagoda
1863061.pendulum_effect: You can destroy this face-up card in your Pendulum Zone: Special Summon 1 "Shinadow" non-Ritual monster from your hand, GY or face-up Extra Deck, and if you do, your opponent gains 1000 LP. You can only use this effect of "Shinadow Pagoda" once per turn.

1869172.effect: If you control a "Shinadow" Ritual Monster: You can Special Summon this card from your hand or face-up Extra Deck. You can reveal 1 "Shinadow" Ritual Monster in your hand, or target 1 face-up "Shinadow" Ritual Monster on your field or in your Pendulum Zone; this cards Level becomes equal to that monsters. You can only use each effect of "Shinadow Chie" once per turn.
1869172.name: Shinadow Chie
1869172.pendulum_effect: If a "Shinadow" Ritual Monster is summoned to your side of the field, you can target 1 "Shinadow" card in your GY: Add it to your hand. You can only use this effect of "Shinadow Chie" once per turn.

1860560.effect: If this card is Normal or Pendulum Summoned: You can Tribute this card; reveal 3 "Shinadow" monsters with different names from your Deck, have your opponent randomly choose 1 of them, and you either place it in your Pendulum Zone or Special Summon it, also add the rest to the Extra Deck. When this card is destroyed by an opponent's card (either by battle or by card effect): You can choose 1 Shinadow Ritual Monster in your Deck; place it in your Extra Deck or in your Pendulum Zone. You can only use each effect of "Shinadow Dokue" once per turn.
1860560.name: Shinadow Dokue
1860560.pendulum_effect: If you have a "Shinadow" card in your other Pendulum Zone, you can activate this effect: Pendulum Summon 1 "Shinadow" Ritual Monster, from your hand or Extra Deck (This Special Summon is also treated as a Ritual Summon.) You can destroy this card: Add 1 Shinadow Ritual Monster Card from your Deck to your hand. You can only use one effect of "Shinadow Dokue" per turn, and only once per turn.

1860589.effect: This card can be used to Ritual Summon any "Shinadow" Ritual Monster from your hand or Extra Deck. You must also Tribute monsters in your hand, field and Pendulum Zone, whose total Levels equal the Level of that Ritual Monster or more, then, if both materials were monsters in the Pendulum Zones, target 1 card on the field: Destroy it. If your opponent Special Summon a monster(s), while this card is in your GY, you can banish 1 card from your GY; set this card to your side of the field, but banish it when it leaves the field. You can only use this effect of "Shinadow Call" once per turn.
1860589.name: Shinadow Call

1861078.effect:
You can Ritual Summon this card with "Shinadow Call". You can target 1 card in your opponents GY: Banish it. If a "Shinadow" monster is placed into your Spell/Trap zone, you can Special Summon a "Shinadow" monster from your hand or face-up Extra Deck. If this card is Tributed for the Ritual Summon of a "Shinadow" monster, that monster gains this effect:
● Target 1 card in your opponents GY: Banish it.
You can only use each effect of "Shinadow of the Infernal Doom" once per turn.
1861078.name: Shinadow of the Infernal Doom
1861078.pendulum_effect: You cannot Pendulum Summon monsters, except "Shinadow" monsters. This effect cannot be negated. You can discard 1 non-Ritual "Shinadow" monster: Add 1 non-Ritual "Shinadow" monster with a different name from your Deck to your hand with a different name, than you can put 1 "Shinadow" Monster from your face-up Extra Deck into your Pendulum Zone. You can only use each effect of "Shinadow of the Infernal Doom" once per turn

1861054.effect:
You can Ritual Summon this card with "Shinadow Call". You can target 1 card your opponent controls: Destroy it. If a "Shinadow" monster is Ritual Summoned, using a monster in your Spell/Trap zone; you can Special Summon 1 "Shinadow" monster from your GY or face-up Extra Deck. If this card is Tributed for the Ritual Summon of a "Shinadow" monster, that monster gains this effect:
● Target 1 card on the field: Destroy it.
You can only use each effect of "Shinadow of the Forbidden Fortress" once per turn.
1861054.name: Shinadow of the Forbidden Fortress
1861054.pendulum_effect: You cannot Pendulum Summon monsters, except "Shinadow" monsters. This effect cannot be negated. You can discard 1 "Shinadow" Ritual Monster: Add 1 "Shinadow" Ritual Monster from your Deck to your hand with a different name, than you can put 1 "Shinadow" Monster from your face-up Extra Deck into your Pendulum Zone. You can only use each effect of "SHinadow of the Forbidden Fortress" once per turn.

1863042.effect:
You can Ritual Summon this card with "Shinadow Call". You can target 1 "Shinadow" non-Ritual Monster in your face-up Extra Deck: Special Summon it. If your opponent activtes a monster effect; you can negate the activation. If this card is Tributed for the Ritual Summon of a "Shinadow" monster, that monster gains this effect:
● You can target 1 "Shinadow" non-Ritual Monster in your face-up Extra Deck: Special Summon it.
You can only use each effect of "Shinadow of the Ancient Temple" once per turn.
1863042.name: Shinadow of the Ancient Temple
1863042.pendulum_effect: You cannot Pendulum Summon monsters, except "Shinadow" monsters. This effect cannot be negated. You can place 1 "Shinadow" card from your hand into your Extra Deck, face-up: Draw 1 card, then discard 1 card. You can only use each effect of "Shinadow of the Ancient Temple" once per turn

1863015.effect: You can Ritual Summon this card with "Shinadow Call". If this card was Ritual Summoned using a monster in the Spell/Trap zone, you can Tribute 1 monster you control: Destroy all monsters your opponent controls. During the Main Phase, you can pay 1000 LP; put 1 "Shinadow" monster from your GY or Deck into your Pendulum Scale. If this face-up card in your Monster Zone would leave the field, you can place it in your Pendulum Scale. You can only use each effect of "Abyss King of the Shinadow" once per turn.
1863015.name: Abyss King of the Shinadow
1863015.pendulum_effect: You cannot Pendulum Summon monsters, except "Shinadow" monsters. This effect cannot be negated. During the Main Phase, you can immediately after this effect resolves, Pendulum Summon up to 2 "Shinadow" Ritual Monsters from your hand, GY or face-up Extra Deck, ignoring their summoning conditions, but their effects are negated, also any battle damage your opponent takes for the rest of the turn is halved. You can discard 1 Card; Tribute "Shinadow" monsters from your hand or field whose total Levels equal 10 or more, and if you do, Ritual Summon this card from the Pendulum Zone. You can only use each effect of "Abyss King of the Shinadow" once per turn.

1732911.effect: If this card is Normal Summoned: You can send 1 "Aquarian Art" card from your Deck to your GY. (Quick Effect): You can discard this card, then target 1 "Aquarian Kiara" monster you control and 1 monster your opponent controls; switch their ATK/DEF with each other until the end of this turn.
1732911.name: Aquarius Kiara's Contractor
1732911.pendulum_effect: You can reveal 1 "Aquarius Kiara" monster or "Aquarian Art" Spell/Trap in your hand and pay 1000 LP; this turn, you can Normal Summon 1 "Aquarius Kiara" monster in addition to your Normal Summon/Set. (Even if this card leaves the field. You can only gain this effect once per turn.)

1727240.effect: If this card is Summoned: You can add 1 "Aquarius Kiara" monster or 1 "Aquarius Art" Spell from your Deck to your hand. If an "Aquarius Kiara" card(s) you control would be destroyed by battle or card effect, you can banish this card from your GY instead. You can only use each effect of "Aquarius Kiara - Stage 0" once per turn.
1727240.name: Aquarius Kiara - Maiden

1727260.effect:
You can Tribute 1 "Aquarius Kiara" monster you control with a different original name; Special Summon this card from your hand or GY. This card gains 100 ATK/DEF for every "Aquarian Art" card in your GY. If you activate a Spell/Trap Card: You can apply 1 of the following effects.
● 1 card in this card's column has its effects negated. You can only use each effect of "Aquarius Kiara - Caster" once per turn.
● 1 other "Aquarius Kiara" monster you control gains 500 ATK and DEF
1727260.name: Aquarius Kiara - Caster

1727317.effect: You can Tribute 1 "Aquarius Kiara" monster you control with a different original name; Special Summon this card from your hand or GY. This card gains 100 ATK/DEF for every "Aquarian Art" card in your GY. If you activate a Spell/Trap Card: You can destroy 1 monster in this card's column. You can only use each effect of "Aquarius Kiara - Bladedancer" once per turn.
1727317.name: Aquarius Kiara - Bladedancer

1727347.effect: You can Tribute 1 "Aquarius Kiara" monster you control with a different original name; Special Summon this card from your hand or GY. This card gains 100 ATK/DEF for every "Aquarian Art" card in your GY. If this card is targeted by a card effect while you control another "Aquarius Kiara" card: You can banish this card until the end phase. If this card returns to the field after being banished by its own effect: Target 1 card your opponent controls: banish it. You can only use each effect of "Aquarius Kiara - Dragoon" once per turn.
1727347.name: Aquarius Kiara - Dragoon

1729710.effect: When a Spell/Trap, or monster effect, is activated while you control an "Aquarius Kiara" monster: Negate the activation, and if you do, destroy it OR send 1 "Aquarian Art" Spell/Trap from your Deck to your GY. You can only activate 1 "Aquarian Art - Ocean's Sigil" per turn.
1729710.name: Aquarian Art - Ocean's Sigil

1727440.effect:
You can only activate this card if you control an "Aquarius Kiara" monster. Apply the following effects in sequence depending on how many "Aquarian Arts" cards you control and are in your GY.
●2+: Destroy one Spell/Trap card your opponent controls.
●4+: Negate the effects of 1 monster your opponent controls that was Special Summoned from the Extra Deck until the end of the turn.
●6+: Shuffle 4 "Aquarian Art" or "Aquarius Kiara" cards in your GY into your Deck: Draw 2 cards, but they cannot be activated this turn unless they are "Aquarius Kiara" or "Aquarian Art" cards.
1727440.name: Aquarian Art - Ocean Dragon Strike

1727384.effect: You can send 1 card from the top of the Deck to the GY for every "Aquarius Kiara" card you control. You can banish this card from your GY; add 1 "Aquarian Art" Spell/Trap from your GY to your hand, except "Aquarian Art - Pure Sea Stones". You can only use 1 "Aquarian Art - Pure Sea Stones" effect per turn, and only once that turn.
1727384.name: Aquarian Art - Pure Sea Stones

1869782.effect: You can banish 1 "Aquarius Kiara" monster from your GY; Special Summon 1 "Aquarius Kiara" Link Monster from your Extra Deck. If the activation of an "Aquarian Art" card in your possession was negated by your opponent's card effect and sent to your GY: You can discard 1 card; add that card to your hand. You can only use each effect of "Aquarian Art Domain" once per turn.
1869782.name: Aquarian Art Domain

1729811.effect: You can target 1 "Aquarius Kiara" monster you control; send it to the GY, and if you do, Special Summon 1 "Aquarius Kiara" monster from your Deck with a different name. You can banish this card from your GY; Special Summon 1 "Aquarius Kiara Token" (Aqua/WATER/Level 1/ATK 0/DEF 0) in Defense Position. You cannot Special Summon monsters the turn you activate either of these effects, except "Aquarius Kiara" monsters. You can only use 1 "Aquarian Art - Magical Contract" effect per turn, and only once that turn
1729811.name: Aquarian Art - Magical Contract

1729739.effect:
1 "Aquarius Kiara" monster.
Gains ATK equal to the combined original ATK of the materials used for its Link Summon. If this card is Special Summoned: You can Special Summon 1 "Aquarius Kiara" monster from your GY to your zone this card points to. (Quick Effect): You can banish 1 "Aquarian Art" Spell from your GY, then target 1 "Aquarian Art" Spell in your GY; this effect becomes that (card/Spell)'s effect when that card is activated. You can only use each effect of "Aquarius Kiara - Masterclass" once per turn.
1729739.name: Aquarius Kiara - Masterclass

1875101.effect:
If this card is Summoned: You can target 1 "Entity" monster in your GY; Special Summon it, but negate its effects until the End Phase of this turn. If this card is in your GY: You can target 1 "Entity" Monster on your side of the field; equip this card the targeted monster. You can only use each effect of "Earthly Entity Chthonian" once per turn.
A monster eqquped with this card gains the following effect:
●Once per turn,f this card destroys a monster by battle: You can draw 1 card.
1875101.name: Earthly Entity Chthonian

1875078.effect: If this card is Summoned: You can Special Summon 1 "Entity" monster from your Deck, also for the rest of the turn you cannot Special Summon monsters, except "Entity" monsters. If this card is sent to the GY: Add 1 card that specifically lists "Entity" in its text from your Deck to your hand, except "Earthly Entity Migo". You can only use each effect of "Earthly Entity Migo" once per turn.
1875078.name: Earthly Entity Migo

1875073.effect:
If you Special Summon 1 "Entity" monster from your Extra Deck, while this card is in your GY: You can Special summon this card in ATK position, but banish if this card leaves the field. If this card is Special Summoned by a effect of a "Entity" monster,you can use 1 of these effects:
●Target 1 monster on the field; reduce its level by 2
●Target 1 monster on the field; increase its level by 2
You can only use each effect of "Earthly Entity Shub" once per turn.
1875073.name: Earthly Entity Shub

1875958.effect: Target 1 "Entity" Monster on your GY; Special Summon it, then equip it with this card. The equipped monster has its effects negated. You can only control 1 "Forbidden Mi-Go Brain Cylinder".
1875958.name: Forbidden Mi-Go Brain Cylinder

1875139.effect: Discard 1 card; add 1 "Entity" card or 1 card that specifically lists "Entity" in its text except from your Deck to your hand, except "Entity Sacrifice", also for the rest of the turn you cannot Special Summon monsters, except "Entity" monsters.You can only use 1 "Entity sacrifice" per turn.
1875139.name: Forbidden Sacrifice

1881448.effect: If you control an "Entity" Monster: Target cards on the field, up the number of "Entity" monsters with different types (Xyz,Synchro or Fusion) in your side of the field; destroy them. You can only activate 1 "Forbidden Cthulhu Awakening" per turn
1881448.name: Forbidden Cthulhu Awakening

1875116.effect:
1 Synchro or Xyz Monster + 1 Synchro or Xyz Monster
Must be Special Summoned from your Extra Deck by sending the above cards you control to the GY. (You do not use "Polymerization".).
Once per turn: You can target 1 Level 4 or lower "Entity" monster in your Graveyard; Special Summon it, but its effects are negated and banish it when it leaves the field. You can only use this effect of "Elder Entity Profundos" once per turn, also for the rest of the turn, you cannot Special Summon monsters, except "Entity" monsters.
1875116.name: Elder Entity Profundos

1875199.effect:
1 "Entity" Tuner + 1+ non-Tuner monsters
Cannot be destroyed by battle. Once per turn: If you opponent activates a card or effect, while you control 2 "Entity" monster Special Summoned from the Extra Deck with diferent Types (Xyz,Synchro and Fusion): You can negate the activation, and if you do, destroy it.You can only use this effect of "Old Entity Ghata" once per turn.
1875199.name: Old Entity Ghata

1875087.effect:
1 Tuner + 1 non-Tuner monster
If this card is Synchro Summoned: You can Special Summon 1 "Entity" monster from your Deck,but for the rest of your turn you cannot Special Summon monsters, expect "Entity" monsters.You can only use this effect of "Old Entity Tegoth" once per turn.
An Xyz Monster that was Summoned using this card on the field as Xyz Material gains this effect:
● Once per turn, the first time this card would be destroyed, it is not destroyed.
1875087.name: Old Entity Tegoth

1875106.effect:
2+ Level 4 monsters
Once per turn: You can detach 1 material from this card, then target up to 3 "Entity" cards in your Gy; shuffle them into the Deck, then draw 1 card.You can only use this effect of "Outer Entity Cthulhu" once per turn.
1875106.name: Outer Entity Cthulhu

1875121.effect:
3 level 5 monsters
You can also Xyz Summon this card by using an "Outer Entity" Xyz Monster you control as material. (Transfer its materials to this card.) Cannot be used as material for an Xyz Summon. If this card has at least 3 Xyz Materials (1 Fusion, 1 Synchro, and 1 Xyz Monster) , you can activate one of this effects (All Xyz materials of this card must be "Entity" monsters to activate and resolve this effects):
●If your opponent activates a card or effect (Quick Effect):You can negate the activation, and if you do, destroy it.
●You can detach 1 material from this card; destroy all cards your opponent controls..You can only use this effect of "Outer Entity Goroth"
1875121.name: Outer Entity Goroth
